content.content:
The balance as at 30 September 2022 represented receivables of CNY640K from Third-party receivables. The Target recognised revenue using straight-line method; we reclassified the levelling impact of revenue recognition in the rent-free period to other non-current assets at the end of September 2022.
Management did not accrue bad debt provision for accounts receivables from Third-party receivables, we indicatively accrued provision at the rate of 1% amounting to CNY6K according to the Target's policy, resulting in a net receivable balance of CNY634K.

SUMMARY: Used entity 'Third-party receivables' with amounts: CNY640K (gross receivables), CNY6K (provision), and CNY634K (net total)
